scripts.cc: rm -rf codeclimate.html && codeclimate engines:install && codeclimate analyze -f html > codeclimate.html
scripts.config:build: aws-sso-util configure profile -u https://d-906769c34d.awsapps.com/start --sso-region us-east-1 --region us-east-2 -a 359954733328 --existing-config-action overwrite -r PowerUserAccess general-team-sbx
scripts.config:deploy: aws-sso-util configure profile -u https://d-906769c34d.awsapps.com/start --sso-region us-east-1 --region us-east-2 -a 096784943247 --existing-config-action overwrite -r AWSAdministratorAccess iap_cloud-app-dev
scripts.config:kube: aws-sso-util configure profile -u https://d-906769c34d.awsapps.com/start --sso-region us-east-1 --region us-east-2 -a 563083887328 --existing-config-action overwrite -r AWSAdministratorAccess services-app-dev && AWS_PROFILE=services-app-dev aws eks --region us-east-2 update-kubeconfig --name iap-admin-dev-use2 --alias iap-admin-dev-use2
scripts.config: npm run config:build && npm run config:deploy && npm run login && npm run config:kube
scripts.deploy: npm run kube:context && AWS_PROFILE=iap_cloud-app-dev helm upgrade trial-workspace ./helm -f ./helm-vars/trial-workspace/iap-admin-dev/values.yaml -n trial-workspace --create-namespace --set "image.tag=$npm_config_tag"
scripts.deploy:restart: npm run kube:context && kubectl rollout restart deployment trial-workspace -n trial-workspace
